actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: By hitting the teddy bear multiple times, they have warded away the darkness from this object.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: They have saved a teddy bear from an ancient darkness plaguing millions of human lives. GOOD JOB GUYS.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: They don’t stop to wonder what this means. They just roll with it.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: However, they know that evil demon child is still probably within Perkins, planning something diabolical, like making an evil lamp or something.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: The only place they haven’t investigated yet is the third floor, so our heroes journey to the depths of wherever that might be.
